summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to complete preconstruction and right of way activities, including acquisition of right of way for the replacement of the West Fort Street Bridge, authorizing the hiring of consultants, authorizing negotiation and execution of agreements with Burlington Northern Railroad and the State of Washington; and making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Seattle General Street Improvement Bonds, 1960 Fund therefor.
